title: Client Lag? Dc'd?
body:
Was Queuing up with a friend in ranked and was in the champ select menu and it stayed frozen at the 0 second mark before banning was up, I couldnt pick someone to ban (I was second in line to ban) much less pick my champ i wanted to play.

I was at 83 lp, 17 lp away from being in my silver 5 promos... now I have to deal with a 30 minute leaverbuster for something that messed up on riots part,(my internet never cut out) and keep in mine I now have 73 lp.

replies.body:
From the description, it definitely sounds like your hypothesis is correct.  When you were in Champion Select, there was some sort of Lag or DC that caused you not to be able to ban and got you a dodge penalty.

Is this the only time something like this has occurred?  Or does this happen frequently?  Reply back and let me know!

check out the rest of the boards - this is a widespread issue. 

kind of a joke too lol

just had it happen three times in a row and a bunch of my mates are getting the same issues.
happens too me but not for too long it just doesn't let me pick my character for most of pick intent phase occasionally
First time its happened. Thanks for the response!
